name: GCPhysicalInputProfile
desc: The base class for controller profiles that support physical buttons, thumbsticks, and directional pads.

items.name: var device: GCDevice?
items.desc: The physical device that the profile represents.

items.name: var lastEventTimestamp: TimeInterval
items.desc: The time of the most recent change to an elementâ€™s value in the profile.

items.name: var elements: [String : GCControllerElement]
items.desc: The elements in the profile as key-value pairs for lookup by name.

items.name: var buttons: [String : GCControllerButtonInput]
items.desc: The buttons in the profile as key-value pairs for lookup by name.

items.name: var axes: [String : GCControllerAxisInput]
items.desc: The axes in the profile as key-value pairs for lookup by name.

items.name: var dpads: [String : GCControllerDirectionPad]
items.desc: The directional pads in the profile as key-value pairs for lookup by name.

items.name: var touchpads: [String : GCControllerTouchpad]
items.desc: The touchpads in the profile as key-value pairs for lookup by name.

items.name: subscript(String) -> GCControllerElement?
items.desc: Returns the element that the key specifies.

items.name: var allDpads: Set<GCControllerDirectionPad>
items.desc: The directional pads in the profile.

items.name: func capture() -> Self
items.desc: Returns a snapshot of the profile with its current element values.

items.name: func setStateFromPhysicalInput(GCPhysicalInputProfile)
items.desc: Copies the input values from a specified physical input profile to a snapshot of the profile.

items.name: var hasRemappedElements: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the user remaps elements in this profile.

items.name: func mappedElementAlias(forPhysicalInputName: String) -> String
items.desc: Returns the name of the input element to which the user remaps the given physical element.

items.name: func mappedPhysicalInputNames(forElementAlias: String) -> Set<String>
items.desc: Returns the physical input elements to which the user remaps the given input element.
